instruction: Please explain how rigorous and focused inclusion criteria for benchmarks like PEPFI can benefit asset managers and their clients.
output: Rigorous and focused inclusion criteria for benchmarks like PEPFI help maintain the relevance of a peer group with similar strategic aims. When combined with detailed asset-level attribution analysis, these criteria can provide asset managers and their clients with a more finely detailed assessment of their portfolios' relative performance. This can help identify areas for improvement and enable more informed investment decisions. Ultimately, this can lead to better performance outcomes for both asset managers and their clients.
